entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gananoque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grenadier Island 02:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: NE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain near noon and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
